title: Custom Page Class in Sitefinity 3.x
content:
Every page inherits from the same page class...make it your own custom one instead!  

1.  Create your new class in App\_Code, and inherit from InternalPage
2.  Find Site\\Sitefinity\\cmsentrypoint.aspx, edit it and change the Page Inherits to your new class
seoDescription: Quick two steps to change which class every page inherits from
